title: Introducing: Kolo Tamam
content:
From the Arabic phrase roughly translated as ‘Everything is cool / All OK’, Manchester six piece Kolo Tamam instil much of this easygoing, laid-bak attitude into their music.

With four track currently sitting on their Soundcloud, although a couple more disappeared a month or so back, their sound is as diverse as it is at times atmospheric (Intermission). Their newest composition, Mesophase (yet another imaginatively relevant title) is their strongest yet, combining Alt-J like rhythms with a knack for finding a killer melody, and suggests that there’s some serious songwriting talent here.
